AttributeAndProperty.description: A attribute and property of condition group.

AttributeValue.description: The value of attribute and property.

CatalogEntryIdentifier.description: The identifier of the catalog entry.

id.description: The internal unique reference number of the catalog entry. In Delete, either this field or the PartNumber is required.

ownerId.description: The numeric identifier of the organization that owns the catalog entry.

partNumber.description: The unique part number of the catalog entry. This field cannot be null in Insert or Replace. In Delete, either this field or the CatalogEntryUniqueId is required. The part number for a catalog entry displays in Management Center as the value for the catalog entry Code property.

storeId.description: The unique numeric ID for identifying the store.

description.example: Optionally required when creating a catalog filter.

name.example: Required when creating a catalog filter

ConditionGroup.description: A condition group of category element selection.

tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to manage catalog filters.
tags.name: Catalog Filters
